div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 647 Poroschia, 7 km. S of Alexandria, Ru- mania, 1943 or earlier Burial: after 81 B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 124 AR Thasos: 39 spread-flan tetradr. Roman Rep.: 85 den. Disposition: dispersed â€ Moisil, Balcania 1944, p. 13, nos. 7-8, illus. Spiru, SCN 3 (1960), p. 553 The two reports seem to refer to the same hd. although Spiru says it was found in 1927-28
